Package itemManagement

Interface Item

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bread, Chips, Coin, EnergyDrink, IceCream, LargeHP, Meat, ShipPart, SmallHP, SpacePills, Water
    public interface Item
    The interface for all item class
    Author:
    Jason Smit, Ariel Evangelista

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCount()
      Adds 1 to the items count, representing how many of this type item the player owns.
      void deductCount()
      Deducts 1 to the items count, representing how many of this type item the player owns.
      javax.swing.JButton getBuyBtn​(int x, int y, MainScreen window)
      Creates a JButton that can be used to display the item in the space outpost.
      int getCount()
      Gets the current number of item of this type
      double getDropChance()
      Gets the chance of this item to drop
      java.lang.String getName()
      Will return the name the item
      int getPrice()
      Gets the price of this item
      javax.swing.JButton getSellBtn​(int x, int y, MainScreen window)
      Creates a JButton that can be used to display the item in a player's inventory at the space outpost.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Will return the category the item would fall into (the items type)
      javax.swing.JButton getUseBtn​(int x, int y, MainScreen window)
      Creates a JButton that can be used to display the item in a players inventory.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Will return the name the item
        Returns:
        A String representing the name of the item.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Will return the category the item would fall into (the items type)
        Returns:
        A String representing what kind of item this is.

      • addCount

        void addCount()
        Adds 1 to the items count, representing how many of this type item the player owns.

      • deductCount

        void deductCount()
        Deducts 1 to the items count, representing how many of this type item the player owns.

      • getCount

        int getCount()
        Gets the current number of item of this type
        Returns:
        Current number of item of this type

      • getDropChance

        double getDropChance()
        Gets the chance of this item to drop
        Returns:
        The chance of this item to drop

      • getPrice

        int getPrice()
        Gets the price of this item
        Returns:
        The price of this item

      • getUseBtn

        javax.swing.JButton getUseBtn​(int x,
                              int y,
                              MainScreen window)
        Creates a JButton that can be used to display the item in a players inventory.
        Parameters:
        x - position of the button in the x axis
        y - position of the button in the y axis
        window - The managing MainScreen class
        Returns:
        The created item JButton
